    gaokao

    Comments Count

    已知a, b, c为正数，且满足abc=1. 证明： \begin{align} \frac{1}{a} + \frac{1}{b} + \frac{1}{c} \le a^2 + b^2 + c^2 \end{align} 和 \begin{align} (a+b)^3 + (b+c)^3+ (c+d)^3 \ge 24 \end{align}

  • Ring Polymer Molecular Dynamics Derivation

    physics derivation

    Comments Count

    Schrodinger’s equations states that \begin{align} \frac{d}{dt}|\Psi_t \rangle = \frac{-i \cdot \hat H}{\hbar} \cdot |\Psi_t \rangle \end{align} A formal solution to the equation is \begin{align} |\Psi_t \rangle = e^{\frac{-i \cdot \hat Ht}{\hbar}} \cdot |\Psi_0 \rangle \end{align}

  • Liouville's Theorem derivation

    physics derivation

    Comments Count

    In classical mechanics the liouville’s theorem states that the intgeral element \begin{align} \partial p_0 \partial q_0 = \partial p_t \partial q_t \end{align} where and are the generalized coordinates at time 0 and t, respectively.
